about_the_game:
Access to the playable character Tira in the full retail version of SOULCALIBUR VI.

The pack also includes a unique story for Tira in the Soul Chronicle mode.

This content can also be accessed with the SOULCALIBUR VI season pass (sold separately). Be sure to check that you have not purchased the same content twice.

You must have the full retail version of the game to use this content. Additionally, you must be playing on the latest version of the game to access the content.
detailed_description:
Access to the playable character Tira in the full retail version of SOULCALIBUR VI.

The pack also includes a unique story for Tira in the Soul Chronicle mode.

This content can also be accessed with the SOULCALIBUR VI season pass (sold separately). Be sure to check that you have not purchased the same content twice.

You must have the full retail version of the game to use this content. Additionally, you must be playing on the latest version of the game to access the content.

name: SOULCALIBUR VI - DLC1: Tira

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
